60     assert(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a9ea585f131ab02ae1e0c0192126f0b5f}{optimizer}() == \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer} && \textcolor{stringliteral}{"underlying linear solver
       operates on different graph"});
61     assert(dynamic\_cast<BlockSolverBase*>(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}) && \textcolor{stringliteral}{"underlying linear solver is not a block
       solver"});
62 
63     BlockSolverBase* blockSolver = \textcolor{keyword}{static\_cast<}BlockSolverBase*\textcolor{keyword}{>}(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver});
64 
65     \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (iteration == 0 && !online) \{ \textcolor{comment}{// built up the CCS structure, here due to easy time measure}
66       \textcolor{keywordtype}{bool} ok = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a6c93ac0f528ffe05867d33150c54f46f}{buildStructure}();
67       \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (! ok) \{
68         cerr << \hyperlink{macros_8h_a9c15fe1e91b07ea3280f5239f9841b67}{\_\_PRETTY\_FUNCTION\_\_} << \textcolor{stringliteral}{": Failure while building CCS structure"} << endl;
69         \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a705d58d7bc19528a8ab718570d090cdfa375598c3a146bb5116b5d19bb1a88f84}{OptimizationAlgorithm::Fail};
70       \}
71 
72       \textcolor{comment}{// init some members to the current size of the problem}
73       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a8f4ee408fbf3999063d094cf61e852b7}{\_hsd}.resize(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a739e1e7b0888d5f316f1d68cbd21bc2d}{vectorSize}());
74       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl}.resize(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a739e1e7b0888d5f316f1d68cbd21bc2d}{vectorSize}());
75       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector}.resize(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a739e1e7b0888d5f316f1d68cbd21bc2d}{vectorSize}());
76       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta} = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_ae77ffaea89872affeb61f122f20efeb9}{\_userDeltaInit}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Property_aefa3e7a5fcb2c8e061ecb07485f1371c}{value}();
77       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aacc051a6740fc6017dac7c424dc7df3d}{\_currentLambda} = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3a94c7696f07e3def38ec96a1979babd}{\_initialLambda}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Property_aefa3e7a5fcb2c8e061ecb07485f1371c}{value}();
78       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_af921ebbebaf059f73e410fc751616ec2}{\_wasPDInAllIterations} = \textcolor{keyword}{true};
79     \}
80 
81     \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} t=\hyperlink{namespaceg2o_aa64237935c7d8411b4369234a5f661ea}{get\_monotonic\_time}();
82     \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1SparseOptimizer_a09572668aa85b75a5bebf7b66401ce8f}{computeActiveErrors}();
83     G2OBatchStatistics* globalStats = \hyperlink{structg2o_1_1G2OBatchStatistics_a06f9c667d8b48b8f0023e27011818b64}{G2OBatchStatistics::globalStats}();
84     \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (globalStats) \{

86       t=\hyperlink{namespaceg2o_aa64237935c7d8411b4369234a5f661ea}{get\_monotonic\_time}();
87     \}
88 
89     \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} currentChi = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1SparseOptimizer_ae47c5023e53685523499fc00d6057d14}{activeRobustChi2}();
90 
91     \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_ac1565e85d5ca68a87ad7f06f8164a8c0}{buildSystem}();
92     \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (globalStats) \{
93       globalStats->timeQuadraticForm = \hyperlink{namespaceg2o_aa64237935c7d8411b4369234a5f661ea}{get\_monotonic\_time}()-t;
94     \}
95 
96     Eigen::VectorXd::ConstMapType b(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a3212ad9d80f8f5ad15b72c2b55000095}{b}(), \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->
      \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a739e1e7b0888d5f316f1d68cbd21bc2d}{vectorSize}());
97 
98     \textcolor{comment}{// compute alpha}
99     \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector}.setZero();
100     blockSolver->multiplyHessian(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector}.data(), \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a3212ad9d80f8f5ad15b72c2b55000095}{b}());
101     \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} bNormSquared = b.squaredNorm();
102     \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} alpha = bNormSquared / \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector}.dot(b);
103 
104     \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a8f4ee408fbf3999063d094cf61e852b7}{\_hsd} = alpha * b;
105     \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} hsdNorm = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a8f4ee408fbf3999063d094cf61e852b7}{\_hsd}.norm();
106     \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} hgnNorm = -1.;
107 
108     \textcolor{keywordtype}{bool} solvedGaussNewton = \textcolor{keyword}{false};
109     \textcolor{keywordtype}{bool} goodStep = \textcolor{keyword}{false};
110     \textcolor{keywordtype}{int}& numTries = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aeab37f3f587dc8b37b5a42d36fd8217c}{\_lastNumTries};
111     numTries = 0;
112     \textcolor{keywordflow}{do} \{
113       ++numTries;
114 
115       \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (! solvedGaussNewton) \{
116         \textcolor{keyword}{const} \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} minLambda = 1e-12;
117         \textcolor{keyword}{const} \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} maxLambda = 1e3;
118         solvedGaussNewton = \textcolor{keyword}{true};
119         \textcolor{comment}{// apply a damping factor to enforce positive definite Hessian, if the matrix appeared}
120         \textcolor{comment}{// to be not positive definite in at least one iteration before.}
121         \textcolor{comment}{// We apply a damping factor to obtain a PD matrix.}
122         \textcolor{keywordtype}{bool} solverOk = \textcolor{keyword}{false};
123         \textcolor{keywordflow}{while}(!solverOk) \{
124           \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (! \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_af921ebbebaf059f73e410fc751616ec2}{\_wasPDInAllIterations})
125             \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a94a0d5196c7859c6c37fc2368ac56be3}{setLambda}(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aacc051a6740fc6017dac7c424dc7df3d}{\_currentLambda}, \textcolor{keyword}{true});   \textcolor{comment}{// add \_currentLambda
       to the diagonal}
126           solverOk = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a9c359a886db57f2f81e54a2113f3bd38}{solve}();
127           \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (! \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_af921ebbebaf059f73e410fc751616ec2}{\_wasPDInAllIterations})
128             \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a3c40dae9b999c4d18e57b02fd0e0ade2}{restoreDiagonal}();
129           \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_af921ebbebaf059f73e410fc751616ec2}{\_wasPDInAllIterations} = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_af921ebbebaf059f73e410fc751616ec2}{\_wasPDInAllIterations} && 
      solverOk;
130           \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (! \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_af921ebbebaf059f73e410fc751616ec2}{\_wasPDInAllIterations}) \{
131             \textcolor{comment}{// simple strategy to control the damping factor}
132             \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (solverOk) \{
133               \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aacc051a6740fc6017dac7c424dc7df3d}{\_currentLambda} = std::max(minLambda, \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aacc051a6740fc6017dac7c424dc7df3d}{\_currentLambda} / (0.5 * 
      \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a6855a511dc998efef7eaa0ef99e1b814}{\_lamdbaFactor}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Property_aefa3e7a5fcb2c8e061ecb07485f1371c}{value}()));
134             \} \textcolor{keywordflow}{else} \{
135               \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aacc051a6740fc6017dac7c424dc7df3d}{\_currentLambda} *= \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a6855a511dc998efef7eaa0ef99e1b814}{\_lamdbaFactor}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Property_aefa3e7a5fcb2c8e061ecb07485f1371c}{value}();
136               \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aacc051a6740fc6017dac7c424dc7df3d}{\_currentLambda} > maxLambda) \{
137                 \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aacc051a6740fc6017dac7c424dc7df3d}{\_currentLambda} = maxLambda;
138                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a705d58d7bc19528a8ab718570d090cdfa375598c3a146bb5116b5d19bb1a88f84}{Fail};
139               \}
140             \}
141           \}
142         \}
143         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (!solverOk) \{
144           \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a705d58d7bc19528a8ab718570d090cdfa375598c3a146bb5116b5d19bb1a88f84}{Fail};
145         \}
146         hgnNorm = Eigen::VectorXd::ConstMapType(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_acb097d8568624a1f3af4dba808e5593b}{x}(), \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->
      \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a739e1e7b0888d5f316f1d68cbd21bc2d}{vectorSize}()).norm();
147       \}
148 
149       Eigen::VectorXd::ConstMapType hgn(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_acb097d8568624a1f3af4dba808e5593b}{x}(), \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmWithHessian_a88a2d1dccee8f7481ece407f2681a151}{\_solver}->
      \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Solver_a739e1e7b0888d5f316f1d68cbd21bc2d}{vectorSize}());
150       assert(hgnNorm >= 0. && \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Norm of the GN step is not computed"});
151 
152       \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (hgnNorm < \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta}) \{
153         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl} = hgn;
154         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3bf898af0087c0ed8287d0cd13e4c943}{\_lastStep} = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_ae4f6faede88712ebaee01baf8cf20505a27f521fdfb791c330af5e59dd989507d}{STEP\_GN};
155       \}
156       \textcolor{keywordflow}{else} \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (hsdNorm > \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta}) \{
157         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl} = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta} / hsdNorm * \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a8f4ee408fbf3999063d094cf61e852b7}{\_hsd};
158         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3bf898af0087c0ed8287d0cd13e4c943}{\_lastStep} = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_ae4f6faede88712ebaee01baf8cf20505a02cb99985ea3c35b57591e6c55f5e037}{STEP\_SD};
159       \} \textcolor{keywordflow}{else} \{
160         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector} = hgn - \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a8f4ee408fbf3999063d094cf61e852b7}{\_hsd};  \textcolor{comment}{// b - a}
161         \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} \hyperlink{sparse__block__matrix_8hpp_a4e1e0e72dd773439e333c84dd762a9c3}{c} = \_hsd.dot(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector});
162         \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} bmaSquaredNorm = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector}.squaredNorm();
163         \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} beta;
164         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (c <= 0.)
165           beta = (-c + sqrt(c*c + bmaSquaredNorm * (\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta}*\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta} - \_hsd.squaredNorm()))) / 
      bmaSquaredNorm;
166         \textcolor{keywordflow}{else} \{
167           \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} hsdSqrNorm = \_hsd.squaredNorm();
168           beta = (\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta}*\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta} - hsdSqrNorm) / (c + sqrt(c*c + bmaSquaredNorm * (
      \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta}*\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta} - hsdSqrNorm)));
169         \}
170         assert(beta > 0. && beta < 1 && \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Error while computing beta"});
171         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl} = \_hsd + beta * (hgn - \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a8f4ee408fbf3999063d094cf61e852b7}{\_hsd});
172         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3bf898af0087c0ed8287d0cd13e4c943}{\_lastStep} = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_ae4f6faede88712ebaee01baf8cf20505a1bc0276b59002bc8892ea9fc39348d1d}{STEP\_DL};
173         assert(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl}.norm() < \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta} + 1e-5 && \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Computed step does not correspond to the trust
       region"});
174       \}
175 
176       \textcolor{comment}{// compute the linear gain}
177       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector}.setZero();
178       blockSolver->multiplyHessian(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector}.data(), \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl}.data());
179       \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} linearGain = -1 * (\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a225092fe67ce75eb64011c1f45d8d936}{\_auxVector}.dot(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl})) + 2 * (b.dot(
      \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl}));
180 
181       \textcolor{comment}{// apply the update and see what happens}
182       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1SparseOptimizer_a08833d6f9ae487f5608f6113f3635b6b}{push}();
183       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer}->update(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl}.data());
184       \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1SparseOptimizer_a09572668aa85b75a5bebf7b66401ce8f}{computeActiveErrors}();
185       \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} newChi = \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer}-> activeRobustChi2();
186       \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} nonLinearGain = currentChi - newChi;
187       \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (fabs(linearGain) < 1e-12)
188         linearGain = 1e-12;
189       \textcolor{keywordtype}{double} rho = nonLinearGain / linearGain;
190       \textcolor{comment}{//cerr << PVAR(nonLinearGain) << " " << PVAR(linearGain) << " " << PVAR(rho) << endl;}
191       \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (rho > 0) \{ \textcolor{comment}{// step is good and will be accepted}
192         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1SparseOptimizer_ac6344493dc9f66d5443759ff9f2abf6c}{discardTop}();
193         goodStep = \textcolor{keyword}{true};
194       \} \textcolor{keywordflow}{else} \{ \textcolor{comment}{// recover previous state}
195         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a6017c344be0d9f09d6674849849c6b60}{\_optimizer}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1SparseOptimizer_a57dbbb584122c6cfa292bb79d8fcd7ad}{pop}();
196       \}
197 
198       \textcolor{comment}{// update trust region based on the step quality}
199       \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (rho > 0.75)
200         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta} = std::max(\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta}, 3. * \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_aaf433c824153a7bd76b27690eb53113b}{\_hdl}.norm());
201       \textcolor{keywordflow}{else} \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (rho < 0.25)
202         \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a3484b12efddd9fc0051100634effecd6}{\_delta} *= 0.5;
203     \} \textcolor{keywordflow}{while} (!goodStep && numTries < \_maxTrialsAfterFailure->value());
204     \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} (numTries == \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithmDogleg_a5993c68e69cd037b1420b4addf9f7e50}{\_maxTrialsAfterFailure}->\hyperlink{classg2o_1_1Property_aefa3e7a5fcb2c8e061ecb07485f1371c}{value}() || !goodStep)
205       \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a705d58d7bc19528a8ab718570d090cdfa3c3d3db3bae371ad18611e0ec5aa99ef}{Terminate};
206     \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizationAlgorithm_a705d58d7bc19528a8ab718570d090cdfa5e94b8ee7748cc4c1a5c86de2e8cc962}{OK};
207   \}
